content-security-policy.name: content-security-policy
content-security-policy.score_description: Content Security Policy (CSP) implemented with default-src 'none' and no 'unsafe'

cross-origin-resource-sharing.name: cross-origin-resource-sharing
cross-origin-resource-sharing.score_description: Content is visible via cross-origin resource sharing (CORS) files or headers, but is restricted to specific domains

redirection.name: redirection
redirection.score_description: Does not redirect to an HTTPS site

strict-transport-security.name: strict-transport-security
strict-transport-security.score_description: HTTP Strict Transport Security (HSTS) header set to a minimum of six months (15768000)

subresource-integrity.name: subresource-integrity
subresource-integrity.score_description: Subresource Integrity (SRI) is only needed for html resources

x-frame-options.name: x-frame-options
x-frame-options.score_description: X-Frame-Options (XFO) header set to SAMEORIGIN or DENY

technologies.name: Node.js
technologies.description: Node.js is an open-source, cross-platform, JavaScript runtime environment that executes JavaScript code outside a web browser.

technologies.name: Express
technologies.description: Express is a web application framework for Node.js, released as free and open-source software under the MIT License. It is designed for building web applications and APIs.

technologies.name: HSTS
technologies.description: HTTP Strict Transport Security (HSTS) informs browsers that the site should only be accessed using HTTPS.

attributes.name: Data.Subvention
attributes.pitch: Rassembler les informations sur les associations et leurs subventions pour simplifier la vie des associations et des agents publics
